headline: Price elasticity is largest 'friction point' in snacks: PepsiCo CEO
summary: After the snack food giant reported its fourth quarter earnings, PepsiCo (PEP) chairman and CEO Ramon Laguarta sits down with Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozz to talk more about how it is trying to give consumers more "functional" and affordable food options. Also be sure to watch Yahoo Finance's full interview with Ramon Laguarta. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.
